span.style: font-family: latoregular; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);;color: rgb(40, 40, 40); font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 14px;

span.span: Classroom teachers are sharing information about learning directly with families during the closure. Please contact your student's teacher if you are not receiving updates.

If your family needs to pick up a packet of work for your student, please contact your child's teacher to request a packet. Packet pick-up will take place every other Wednesday, from 9 a.m. to 1 p.m. at the school your child attends.

If you have trouble contacting your child's teacher, please contact:
Mr. Silvus
937-864-1202
Email Mr. Silvus
